alert.note: Alert for Stark; Summit; Wayne (Ohio) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 25 at 1:14AM EDT by NWS Cleveland
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of northwestern Stark, southern Summit and northern Wayne Counties through 200 AM EDT... At 113 AM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Rittman to near Wooster. Movement was east at 45 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Canton, Wooster, Massillon, Barberton, Green, North Canton, Louisville, Orrville, Rittman, Doylestown, Hartville, Creston, Dalton, New Franklin, Norton, Canal Fulton, Smithville, Clinton, Marshallville and Meyers Lake. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with these storms and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
